Installation¶

Ziwia is being developed with requests >= 2.14.2 as only requirement. It uses just small set of its functionality and thus should work even with older versions of requests.

pip install requests

If you install ziwia from PyPi, all requirements should be installed with just one line:

pip install ziwia

Or you may close github repository and install ziwia locally:

git clone https://github.com/malja/ziwia.git

That is all. See Basic Usage for basic examples of usage.
